sentences.en: Considerably increase the glossiness, adhesive force, fullness and aging resistance of theproducts.
sentences.cn: 能显著提高产品的光泽度 、 附着力 、 丰满度、耐老化性.

sentences.en: he'll tell us in the fullness of time.
sentences.cn: 到时候他会告诉我们的。

sentences.en: High fibre diets give the feeling of fullness.
sentences.cn: 高纤维饮食让人有饱胀感。

sentences.en: In the fullness of her joy , she could hardly speak.
sentences.cn: 她欢喜得几乎说不出话来.

sentences.en: In the fullness of his joy, he could hardly speak.
Melville, like Whitman , has a fullness and vigour that appear foreign to the New England Temperament.
sentences.cn: 梅尔维尔象惠特曼一样具有一种新英格兰气质中所缺乏的热情和活力.

sentences.en: OEA sends hunger - curbing messages to the brain to increase feelings of fullness.
sentences.cn: OEA发出饥饿抑制信息到大脑,增加饱胀感.

sentences.en: Practice fullness of chi , stillness for mind, and purity for spirit.
sentences.cn: ◇气上炼足,心上炼定, 神上炼清.

sentences.en: The coat has raglan sleeves, and is cut to give fullness at the back.
sentences.cn: 这件上衣采用了套袖，并且在裁剪上给予背部宽松的空间。

sentences.en: The skirt had fullness over the abdomen, below the tight waist.
sentences.cn: 由此裙子可以在紧束腰线下方的腹部大幅度展开.

sentences.en: These adjectives mean lacking in quantity, fullness, or extent.
sentences.cn: 这些形容词都有在数量 、 程度 、 范围上缺乏和不足的意思.

sentences.en: This dress was tailored to complement her fullness.
sentences.cn: 这条连衣裙裁剪得衬托出她丰满的体型.

sentences.en: Use a red gloss on your bottom lip to give it fullness.
sentences.cn: 下唇使用红色唇彩让它显得丰盈饱满。

sentences.en: Wealth is the burden of bigness, Welfare the fullness of being.
sentences.cn: 财产是沉重的负荷, 幸福是生命的丰满.

sentences.en: When the fullness of time was come, God sent forth his Sonne.
sentences.cn: 当时机成熟时, 上帝派遣他的儿子来到世上.

sentences.en: Without words , from the fullness of her heart she offered up thanks.
sentences.cn: 她从内心表示真诚的无言的感激.

words.tran_cn: 完全的，完整的；满的，充满的；丰富的；完美的；丰满的；详尽的

phrases.tran_cn: 到时候，在适当的时候；最终

phrases.phrase: the fullness of one's (或 the) heart

trans.tran_en: the quality of being large and round in an attractive way
